    Methods in game with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int Food.eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates DinoActor eating Food, and makes the Food disappear if it is eaten completely, finally returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the Food.
    int FoodItem.eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates DinoActor eating FoodItem, and makes the FoodItem disappear if it is eaten completely, finally returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the FoodItem.
    Action Behaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    A factory for creating actions.

    Action AttackBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns AttackAction if the actor is allowed to attack the target by checking necessary conditions, otherwise null is returned.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.breed

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Once the execute method is called, breeding occurs and a description of the action is returned.
    Action BreedingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns BreedingAction if the actor can breed with the target by checking necessary conditions, otherwise null is returned.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.dinosaurs

    Methods in game.dinosaurs with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Pterodactyl.activityDuringSpecialMovement​(GameMap map, Location location)
    Executes special activities (drinking water and eating fish) if the Pterodactyl flies over a lake.
    private boolean DinoActor.checkUnconsciousPeriod​(GameMap map)
    Checks whether the DinoActor is unconscious.
    int Pterodactyl.eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates the Pterodactyl being bitten / eaten by other Actors, if the Actor has a big jaw, the Pterodactyl will be consumed whole and disappears from the map, otherwise it will suffer a decrement in its health level / hit points.
    Actions DinoActor.getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    Returns a collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to the current Actor by going through the interactiveBehaviours array list and calling getAction.
    Action Allosaur.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Updates the attacked period of the Allosaur's victims and removes them from the hashMap if they can now be attacked again, then the super classes playTurn method is called to select an appropriate Action the Allosaur should return for that turn.
    Action DinoActor.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
    Action Pterodactyl.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Checks if the Pterodactyl's flying energy should be recharged, then invokes the super class's playTurn method.
    void DinoActor.roarIfHungry​(GameMap map)
    Checks if the food level / hit points has reached the point where the dinoActor will get hungry.
    void DinoActor.roarIfThirsty​(GameMap map)
    Checks if the water level has reached the point where the dinoActor will get thirsty.

    java.lang.String DrinkingAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Performs the drinking action
    Action DrinkingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns DrinkingAction if the actor is allowed to drink from a lake by checking necessary conditions, otherwise null is returned.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.environment

    Methods in game.environment with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int Bush.eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates DinoActor eating a fruit from the Bush, and returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the fruit.
    int Lake.eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates eating 0,1 or 2 Fish from the Lake, and returns the amount of food points gained by eating the Fish.
    int Tree.eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates DinoActor eating fruits from the Tree, and returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the fruits.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.feeding

    Methods in game.feeding with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String FeedingAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Performs the feeding action, increments the food level of the DinoActor appropriately, and returns a description of the feeding action.
    Action FeedOnActorBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns FeedingAction if the target can be devoured whole (if it is an instance of Food), returns null otherwise.
    Action FeedOnItemBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns FeedingAction if it is possible for a dinosaur to feed on FoodItems and Ground that has food living / growing on it, returns null otherwise.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.movement

    Methods in game.movement with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void DynamicMovement.activityDuringSpecialMovement​(GameMap map, Location location)
    Executes any special activities the Actor can do while using special movement.
    java.lang.String DynamicMoveAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Simulates the special movement of the Actor if it has energy to do so and executes its special activities while using the special movement.
    (package private) abstract Location FollowBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks whether the Location destination has a target that the DinoActor is trying to find and returns it if true, otherwise null is returned.
    (package private) Location FollowBirthingSpotBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if the DinoActor can lay an egg on destination, If yes, the destination will be returned for the DinoActor to move towards it, null will be returned otherwise.
    (package private) Location FollowFoodBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is Food that the DinoActor can eat at location destination.
    (package private) Location FollowMateBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is a mate that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) Location FollowVictimBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is a victim that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) Location FollowWaterBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns the Location destination if it is an instance of DrinkingGround, hence potentially has water, otherwise returns null.
    Action EvadeDinoBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a DynamicMoveAction for the Pterodactyl to flee from the other DinoActors if the Pterodactyl landed on a corpse and there are other DinoActors around, returns null otherwise.
    Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Checks all locations that are within MIN_RADIUS and MAX_RADIUS away from the actor's location.
    Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a DynamicMoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
    private static java.util.List<Location> FollowBehaviour.getSpottedLocations​(GameMap map, Location actorLocation, NumberRange numRange, int offset, boolean forHorizontal)
    Gets locations that are in one cardinal direction of the actor and is offset number of squares away from the actor's location.
    private static java.util.List<Location> FollowBehaviour.lookAround​(GameMap map, Actor actor, int radius)
    Get all locations from radius number of squares away from the Actor's location for all four cardinal directions.
    private boolean EvadeDinoBehaviour.surroundedByDino​(Location location, GameMap map, Actor actor)
    Returns true if the location does not have any DinoActors around it, apart from the Actor that is trying to flee itself, returns false otherwise.

    java.lang.String QuitGameAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Player is removed from the map and message to quit game is output.
    java.lang.String SearchItemAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Perform the Action A probability is generated to see if Player has the luck to find a fruit on the current location.
    Action FedByPlayerBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns PlayerFeedAction if the actor is allowed to feed the target by checking necessary conditions, otherwise null is returned.
    Action Player.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Returns a menu with the list of Actions that the Player can perform and asks for user input to select an Action

  • Uses of GameMap in game.pregnancy

    Methods in game.pregnancy with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String LayEggAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Creates and places an Egg object at the location of the actor to simulate the actor laying an egg, and returns a description of the process.
    Action PregnancyBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Determines whether it is time for a pregnant DinoActor to lay an egg yet.
